topics.body:
Here's a really damn important survival tip:
If you ever are in a situation where a poisonous snake is about to bite you grab it from right behind the head so it can't bite you.  It's the equivalent of a chokehold.  If you grab it directly from behind the jaw it can't move itself to bite.

If it doesn't have fangs but instead has a hole like thing in it's mouth it spits it's poison, but those are rare.
